section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: The Revision page lets you view details about the changes committed during a revision of the source code. Access this page by clicking a revision number from the Source tab.

bullets.title: The Revision page shows
bullets.item: when the change took place (relative to today's local date/time)
who committed the change (you must setup your version control user name in your user profile)
the commit message for the change
the files that changed (and the nature of the change M = Modified, N = New)
the specific changes made within each file (diffs)
a link to each original source file (e.g. if you want to view/download the entire source file)
